title: Trim, catches, sink, arm rests, mud flaps and more

posts.content:
Two pieces of deluxe trim for the rear hatch and the short side (RHD van but would also suit left). The short piece is a little wavey at one end but nice condition. longer piece sold so rear hatch piece left, £15 plus postage.



Empi logo mudflaps, could do with a clean and one of the empi logos is lifting slightly but easily stuck, includes brackets. £15 plus postage




Vw logo mudflaps that were cut down for my slammed van and have a burn mark from an exhaust, ideally for a ratty van. no brackets. £8 pus postage.



Caramel colour interior arm rests. Original caramel arm rests with brackets to attach. SOLD

Just kampers interior catches. A couple of the outer bezels got marked as i was taking them out (£26 new for four). £10 plus postage for these.



AH Schofield forward cargo door lower repair skin. £21 new from schofield. £12 plus postage. never used.


Set of curtains for an 11 window (no back window curtain). These are not lined but are nice. The colour is a greeny blue and an off white/cream, went well with my sea blue van but would go even better with a green one SOLD

Piece of rear wheel arch from the right had side. Good for localised repairs to the inner. £15 plus postage.




45cm diameter sink. Was in our kitchen then made it's way into the van for a season, interior refurb means it's spare. £25 plus postage.


Finally grey rear hatch interior card. Had white vinyl stapled over it so there are some small holes coming through the grey side, a little warped but easily flattened. Think it might be original. £20 plus postage.

Hi Rob...me old firestarter

I will take the arm rests and curtains please

I will pay you with some quality white whiskey or paypal whatever your preference

I'm investing in a new fire basket for this year but steering well clear of left over kindling!!

hmm white whiskey would be very pleasant but not sure it well help with the van resto... well it might strip some panels!! soo paypal would be preferred, I'll send you a pm

£25 for the short side curved piece only? Don't need the other bit.

Dave.

DoubleD wrote:
£25 for the short side curved piece only? Don't need the other bit.

Dave.


sent you a pm.
Is that garden table for sale

gizmo wrote:
